00034 InterfaceEditor::InterfaceEditor(QWidget *parent, LibraryInterface* handler):
00035 QWidget(parent),
00036 busType_(this),
00037 absType_(this),
00038 nameEdit_(this),
00039 nameLabel_(tr("Interface name"), this),
00040 modeEdit_(this),
00041 modeLabel_(tr("Interface mode"), this),
00042 interface_(NULL),
00043 mappingsLabel_(tr("Port map"), this),
00044 mappings_(this),
00045 descriptionLabel_(tr("Description"), this),
00046 descriptionEdit_(this),
00047 handler_(handler) {
00048 
00049         Q_ASSERT(parent);
00050         Q_ASSERT(handler);
00051 
00052         busType_.setTitle(tr("Bus type"));
00053         busType_.setFlat(false);
00054         absType_.setTitle(tr("Abstraction type"));
00055         absType_.setFlat(false);
00056 
00057         // set validator for interface name editor
00058         nameEdit_.setValidator(new VhdlNameValidator(&nameEdit_));
00059 
00060         // set the possible modes to the mode editor
00061         QStringList modes;
00062         modes.append("master");
00063         modes.append("slave");
00064         modes.append("system");
00065         modes.append("mirroredMaster");
00066         modes.append("mirroredSlave");
00067         modes.append("mirroredSystem");
00068         modes.append("monitor");
00069         modes.append("undefined");
00070         modeEdit_.addItems(modes);
00071 
00072         // There are always 2 columns.
00073         mappings_.setColumnCount(2);
00074         mappings_.setHorizontalHeaderItem(0, new QTableWidgetItem(tr("Logical name")));
00075         mappings_.setHorizontalHeaderItem(1, new QTableWidgetItem(tr("Physical name")));
00076         mappings_.horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00077         mappings_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::ResizeToContents);
00078         mappings_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00079         mappings_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::DoubleClicked | QAbstractItemView::SelectedClicked |
00080                 QAbstractItemView::EditKeyPressed);
00081 
00082         // set the maximum height for the description editor
00083         descriptionEdit_.setMaximumHeight(MAX_DESC_HEIGHT);
00084 
00085         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00086         layout->addWidget(&busType_);
00087         layout->addWidget(&absType_);
00088         layout->addWidget(&nameLabel_);
00089         layout->addWidget(&nameEdit_);
00090         layout->addWidget(&modeLabel_);
00091         layout->addWidget(&modeEdit_);
00092         layout->addWidget(&descriptionLabel_);
00093         layout->addWidget(&descriptionEdit_);
00094         layout->addWidget(&mappingsLabel_);
00095         layout->addWidget(&mappings_, 1);
00096 
00097         clear();
00098 }

00103 void InterfaceEditor::setInterface( DiagramConnectionEndPoint* interface ) {
00104         Q_ASSERT(interface);
00105 
00106         qobject_cast<QDockWidget*>(parentWidget())->show();
00107 
00108         // disconnect the previous interface
00109         if (interface_) {
00110                 disconnect(interface_, SIGNAL(destroyed(DiagramConnectionEndPoint*)),
00111                         this, SLOT(clear()));
00112                 disconnect(interface_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00113                         this, SLOT(refresh()));
00114         }
00115 
00116         interface_ = interface;
00117 
00118     Q_ASSERT(interface->getBusInterface());
00119         busType_.setVLNV(interface->getBusInterface()->getBusType());
00120     absType_.setVLNV(interface->getBusInterface()->getAbstractionType());
00121 
00122         // set text for the name editor, signal must be disconnected when name is set 
00123         // to avoid loops 
00124         disconnect(&nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00125                 this, SLOT(onInterfaceNameChanged(const QString&)));
00126         nameEdit_.setText(interface->name());
00127         connect(&nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00128                 this, SLOT(onInterfaceNameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00129 
00130         // set selection for mode editor, signal must be disconnected when mode is set 
00131         // to avoid loops 
00132         disconnect(&modeEdit_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(const QString&)),
00133                 this, SLOT(onInterfaceModeChanged(const QString&)));
00134         // select the correct mode for mode editor
00135         int index = modeEdit_.findText(General::interfaceMode2Str(
00136                 interface->getBusInterface()->getInterfaceMode()));
00137         modeEdit_.setCurrentIndex(index);
00138         connect(&modeEdit_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(const QString&)),
00139                 this, SLOT(onInterfaceModeChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00140 
00141         // display the current description of the interface.
00142         disconnect(&descriptionEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged()),
00143                 this, SLOT(onDescriptionChanged()));
00144         descriptionEdit_.setPlainText(interface->description());
00145         connect(&descriptionEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged()),
00146                 this, SLOT(onDescriptionChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00147 
00148         // set port maps to be displayed in the table widget.
00149         setPortMaps();
00150 
00151         connect(interface, SIGNAL(destroyed(DiagramConnectionEndPoint*)),
00152                 this, SLOT(clear()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00153         connect(interface_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), 
00154                 this, SLOT(refresh()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00155 
00156     bool locked = static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(interface->scene())->isProtected();
00157 
00158         if (!locked && (interface->isHierarchical() ||
00159                     (interface->encompassingComp() != 0 &&
00160                      !interface->encompassingComp()->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid()))) {
00161                 nameEdit_.setEnabled(true);
00162                 modeEdit_.setEnabled(true);
00163                 mappings_.setEnabled(true);
00164                 descriptionEdit_.setEnabled(true);
00165         }
00166         else {
00167                 nameEdit_.setDisabled(true);
00168                 modeEdit_.setDisabled(true);
00169                 mappings_.setDisabled(true);
00170                 descriptionEdit_.setDisabled(true);
00171         }
00172 
00173         // show the editors
00174         busType_.show();
00175         absType_.show();
00176         nameEdit_.show();
00177         nameLabel_.show();
00178         modeEdit_.show();
00179         modeLabel_.show();
00180         descriptionLabel_.show();
00181         descriptionEdit_.show();
00182         mappingsLabel_.show();
00183         mappings_.show();
00184 }

00186 void InterfaceEditor::clear() {
00187         
00188         if (interface_) {
00189                 disconnect(interface_, SIGNAL(destroyed(DiagramConnectionEndPoint*)),
00190                         this, SLOT(clear()));
00191                 disconnect(interface_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00192                         this, SLOT(refresh()));
00193                 interface_ = 0;
00194         }
00195 
00196         disconnect(&nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00197                 this, SLOT(onInterfaceNameChanged(const QString&)));
00198         disconnect(&modeEdit_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(const QString&)),
00199                 this, SLOT(onInterfaceModeChanged(const QString&)));
00200         disconnect(&descriptionEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged()),
00201                 this, SLOT(onDescriptionChanged()));
00202         disconnect(&mappings_, SIGNAL(itemChanged(QTableWidgetItem*)),
00203                 this, SLOT(onPortMapChanged()));
00204 
00205         busType_.setVLNV(VLNV());
00206         busType_.hide();
00207 
00208         absType_.setVLNV(VLNV());
00209         absType_.hide();
00210 
00211         nameEdit_.clear();
00212         nameEdit_.hide();
00213         nameLabel_.hide();
00214 
00215         modeEdit_.hide();
00216         modeLabel_.hide();
00217 
00218         descriptionLabel_.hide();
00219         descriptionEdit_.clear();
00220         descriptionEdit_.hide();
00221 
00222         mappings_.clearContents();
00223         mappings_.hide();
00224         mappingsLabel_.hide();
00225 
00226         qobject_cast<QDockWidget*>(parentWidget())->hide();
00227 }

00229 void InterfaceEditor::onInterfaceModeChanged( const QString& newMode ) {
00230         Q_ASSERT(interface_);
00231 
00232         disconnect(interface_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00233                 this, SLOT(refresh()));
00234 
00235         QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new EndPointChangeCommand(
00236                 interface_, nameEdit_.text(), General::str2Interfacemode(newMode, General::MONITOR),
00237                 descriptionEdit_.toPlainText()));
00238         static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(interface_->scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd);
00239 
00240         connect(interface_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), 
00241                 this, SLOT(refresh()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00242 }
00243 
00244 void InterfaceEditor::onInterfaceNameChanged( const QString& newName ) {
00245         Q_ASSERT(interface_);
00246         
00247         disconnect(interface_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00248                 this, SLOT(refresh())); 
00249 
00250         QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new EndPointChangeCommand(
00251                 interface_, newName, 
00252                 General::str2Interfacemode(modeEdit_.currentText(), General::MONITOR),
00253                 descriptionEdit_.toPlainText()));
00254         static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(interface_->scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd);
00255         
00256         connect(interface_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), 
00257                 this, SLOT(refresh()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00258 }

00260 void InterfaceEditor::onDescriptionChanged() {
00261         Q_ASSERT(interface_);
00262 
00263         disconnect(interface_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00264                 this, SLOT(refresh()));
00265 
00266         QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new EndPointChangeCommand(
00267                 interface_, nameEdit_.text(), 
00268                 General::str2Interfacemode(modeEdit_.currentText(), General::MONITOR),
00269                 descriptionEdit_.toPlainText()));
00270         static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(interface_->scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd);
00271 
00272         connect(interface_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), 
00273                 this, SLOT(refresh()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00274 }

00276 void InterfaceEditor::onPortMapChanged() {
00277         disconnect(interface_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00278                 this, SLOT(refresh()));
00279 
00280         // save the bus interface
00281         QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf = interface_->getBusInterface();
00282 
00283         Q_ASSERT_X(busIf, "PortmapInterfaceTab::onSave()",
00284                 "Null BusInterface pointer");
00285 
00286         QList<QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> > portMaps;
00287 
00288         for (int i = 0; i < mappings_.rowCount(); i++) {
00289                 QString logical = mappings_.item(i, 0)->text();
00290                 QString physical = mappings_.item(i, 1)->text();
00291 
00292                 QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap(new General::PortMap);
00293                 portMap->logicalPort_ = logical;
00294                 portMap->physicalPort_ = physical;
00295 
00296                 portMaps.append(portMap);
00297         }
00298 
00299         QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new EndPointPortMapCommand(interface_, portMaps));
00300         static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(interface_->scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd);
00301         connect(interface_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), 
00302                 this, SLOT(refresh()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00303 }
00304 
00305 void InterfaceEditor::setPortMaps() {
00306 
00307         Q_ASSERT(interface_);
00308 
00309         // signal must be disconnected when changing items to avoid loops
00310         disconnect(&mappings_, SIGNAL(itemChanged(QTableWidgetItem*)),
00311                 this, SLOT(onPortMapChanged()));
00312 
00313         QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf = interface_->getBusInterface();
00314         Q_ASSERT(busIf);
00315         QList<QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> > portMaps = busIf->getPortMaps();
00316 
00317         // get the abstraction def for the interface
00318         VLNV absDefVLNV = busIf->getAbstractionType();
00319         QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absDef;
00320         if (handler_->getDocumentType(absDefVLNV) == VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION) {
00321                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(absDefVLNV);
00322                 absDef = libComp.staticCast<AbstractionDefinition>();
00323         }
00324 
00325         // get the component that contains the selected interface
00326         QSharedPointer<Component> component = interface_->ownerComponent();
00327         Q_ASSERT(component);
00328 
00329         // get the interface mode of the bus interface
00330         General::InterfaceMode interfaceMode = busIf->getInterfaceMode();
00331 
00332         // as many rows as there are interface maps and always 2 columns
00333         mappings_.setRowCount(portMaps.size());
00334 
00335         // stop sorting when adding the ports to avoid sorting after each add
00336         mappings_.setSortingEnabled(false);
00337         int row = 0;
00338         foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap, portMaps) {
00339 
00340                 QString logicalPort = General::toLogicalString(*portMap);
00341                 QTableWidgetItem* logicalItem = new QTableWidgetItem(logicalPort);
00342                 logicalItem->setFlags(Qt::ItemIsSelectable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled);
00343                 // if no abs type is specified
00344                 if (!absDef) {
00345                         logicalItem->setForeground(QBrush(Qt::red));
00346                 }
00347                 // if the logical port does not belong to the abs def
00348                 else if (!absDef->hasPort(portMap->logicalPort_, interfaceMode)) {
00349                         logicalItem->setForeground(QBrush(Qt::red));
00350                 }
00351                 else {
00352                         logicalItem->setForeground(QBrush(Qt::black));
00353                 }
00354 
00355                 // get size of the logical port
00356                 int logicalSize = 1;
00357                 if (portMap->logicalVector_) {
00358                         logicalSize = portMap->logicalVector_->getSize();
00359                 }
00360                 
00361                 // display at least the name of physical port
00362                 QString physicalPort = portMap->physicalPort_;
00363                 // if port map contains vectored physical port.
00364                 if (portMap->physicalVector_) {
00365                         physicalPort = General::toPhysString(*portMap);
00366                 }
00367                 // if port map does not contain physical vector but port is found on the component
00368                 else if (component->hasPort(physicalPort)) {
00369                         physicalPort = General::port2String(physicalPort, 
00370                                 component->getPortLeftBound(physicalPort),
00371                                 component->getPortRightBound(physicalPort));
00372                 }
00373                 QTableWidgetItem* physItem = new QTableWidgetItem(physicalPort);
00374                 physItem->setFlags(Qt::ItemIsSelectable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled);
00375                 // if the port is not contained in the component
00376                 if (!component->hasPort(portMap->physicalPort_)) {
00377                         physItem->setForeground(QBrush(Qt::red));
00378                 }
00379                 else {
00380                         physItem->setForeground(QBrush(Qt::black));
00381                 }
00382 
00383                 // get size of the physical port
00384                 int physicalSize = 1;
00385                 if (portMap->physicalVector_) {
00386                         physicalSize = portMap->physicalVector_->getSize();
00387                 }
00388 
00389                 // if the sizes of the ports don't match
00390                 if (logicalSize != physicalSize) {
00391                         logicalItem->setForeground(QBrush(Qt::red));
00392                         physItem->setForeground(QBrush(Qt::red));
00393                 }
00394                 
00395                 mappings_.setItem(row, 0, logicalItem);
00396                 mappings_.setItem(row, 1, physItem);
00397 
00398                 row++;
00399         }
00400 
00401         // set sorting back after all items are added
00402         mappings_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00403 
00404         connect(&mappings_, SIGNAL(itemChanged(QTableWidgetItem*)),
00405                 this, SLOT(onPortMapChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00406 }
00407 
00408 void InterfaceEditor::refresh() {
00409         Q_ASSERT(interface_);
00410         setInterface(interface_);
00411 }
